蹮字的基本解释

蹮
xiān
古同“跹”。

蹮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiān］
［《廣韻》蘇前切，平先，心。］
［《廣韻》相然切，平仙，心。］
亦作“蹮1”。“跹1”的繁体字。
(1)舞貌。
(2)见“躚躚”。

蹮字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　蹮； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1233第22
【唐韻】【集韻】【正韻】蘇前切【韻會】蕭前切，?音先。躚或作蹮。【說文】蹁蹮，旋行貌。【玉篇】蹁蹮，蹣跚也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?相然切，音僊。義同。

蹮字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
蹮字的起名意思

暂无。

Ruin
Basic explanation of words
Ruin
xiān
Gu Tong "stumbled".
Ruin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiān］
["Guangyun" Su Qianqie, Pingxian, Heart. ]
["Guangyun" is tangent, flat, and heart. ]
Also known as "蹮1". Traditional characters for "跹1".
(1) Dance appearance.
(2) See "Stopping".
Ruin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Foot Character Department] 　蹮; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1233 22
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Su Qianqie [Yunhui] Xiao Qianqie,? Yin first. Slap or slap. [Said the text] traverse, revolving appearance. 【Jade articles】Crumbling, staggering.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? They are tangent, the sound is immortal. The same meaning.
